mapper.insert: insert into places (kakao_place_id, region_id, kakao_place_name, kakao_road_address_name, kakao_phone, kakao_x, kakao_y, kakao_place_url) values (#{kakaoPlaceId}, #{regionId}, #{kakaoPlaceName}, #{kakaoRoadAddressName}, #{kakaoPhone}, #{kakaoX}, #{kakaoY}, #{kakaoPlaceUrl});
insert into plan_places (plan_id, kakao_place_id, day) values (#{planId}, #{kakaoPlaceId}, #{day});
